assets.title: Sleep
assets.raw: const sleep = ms => new Promise( res => setTimeout(res, ms));

annotations.text: Implementing sleep functionality in node.js using setTimeout along with a dynamic argument specifying time to wait. From The Pieces Node.js Collection.

assets.title: Count occurrences
assets.raw: const countOccurrences = (arr, val) => arr.reduce((a, v) => (v === val ? a + 1 : a), 0);

annotations.text: Count the occurences of a value in an array. From The Pieces JavaScript Collection.

assets.title: SQL Query for Filtering Meetings by Date
assets.raw:
table start_time as "Start Time", end_time as "End Time", duration as "Duration" from "Meetings"
where date(date) = date(<% tp.file.title %>)

annotations.text: This code snippet creates a table called "start_time" with columns for start and end time, and duration. The date of the file is equal to its title or greater than it's specified by an expression in each column
Retrieve start time, end time, and duration of meetings filtered by a specific date.
